title: JavaScript
subtitle: JavaScript / ECMAScript and related language topics
content: From first attempts on dynamic website elements in 2007, to whole applications using frameworks, JavaScript is at the heart of our story.
It is the most universal language of the web, hence we believe understanding it and having complete control is essential.

title: Frameworks
subtitle: JavaScript frameworks and libraries
content: React, Redux, Next, you name it. We have worked with them since their inception, understand them and love them.
While naturally leaning towards React, there is no such thing as an universal solution, and a developer's attitude must be open.

title: UI
subtitle: Styling and CSS related topics
content: Without the look, there would be no feel. And since 2007, everything on the web was always about the look.
Starting with plan CSS, we leveraged a number of important tools and libraries to increase development speed and performance.
